mapper.sql: SETTLEMENT_ID, SETTLEMENT_CODE, DRIVER_ID, DRIVER_CODE, DRIVER_NAME, TRANSPORTER_ID, TRACTIR_PLATE_CODE, TRACTOR_ID, TRACTOR_CODE, TRACTOR_NAME, SETTLEMENT_MONTH, SETTLEMENT_DATE_START, SETTLEMENT_DATE_END, ALL_PLAN_COUNT, RECEIPT_COUNT, SETTLEMENT_DATE, PARTICIPATION_DAY, ALL_CONTRACT_PRICE, ETC, OIL_COST, BILL_STATUS, SOCIAL_SECURITY_PRICE, WASH_CAR_PRICE, REPAIR_PRICE, POUR_TRAILER_PRICE, LITTLE_TRAILER_PRICE, BONUS_PRICE, ORERRUN_PRICE, LOSS_PRICE, QUALITYC_CONTROL_PRICE, OTHER_SUBSIDIES_PRICE, SRECEIVE_PRICE, OIL_CARD_PRICE, BORROWING_PRICE, MANEUVERING_PRICE, ATTENDANCE_PRICE, MINOR_REPAIR_PRICE, SHOULD_TICKET_PRICE, TAXES_PRICE, ACTUAL_SALARY_PRICE, ACTUAL_SALARY_ALL_PRICE, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, NOTARIZE_DATE, CORP_ID, REMARK

ds.SETTLEMENT_ID, ds.SETTLEMENT_CODE, ds.DRIVER_ID, ds.DRIVER_CODE, ds.DRIVER_NAME, ds.TRANSPORTER_ID, ds.TRACTIR_PLATE_CODE, ds.TRACTOR_ID, ds. TRACTOR_CODE, ds.TRACTOR_NAME, ds.SETTLEMENT_MONTH, ds.SETTLEMENT_DATE_START, ds.SETTLEMENT_DATE_END, ds.ALL_PLAN_COUNT, ds.RECEIPT_COUNT, ds. SETTLEMENT_DATE, ds.PARTICIPATION_DAY, ds.ALL_CONTRACT_PRICE, ds.ETC, ds.OIL_COST, ds.BILL_STATUS, ds.SOCIAL_SECURITY_PRICE, ds. WASH_CAR_PRICE, ds.REPAIR_PRICE, ds.POUR_TRAILER_PRICE, ds.LITTLE_TRAILER_PRICE, ds.BONUS_PRICE, ds.ORERRUN_PRICE, ds.LOSS_PRICE, ds.QUALITYC_CONTROL_PRICE, ds. OTHER_SUBSIDIES_PRICE, ds.SRECEIVE_PRICE, ds.OIL_CARD_PRICE, ds.BORROWING_PRICE, ds.MANEUVERING_PRICE, ds. ATTENDANCE_PRICE, ds.MINOR_REPAIR_PRICE, ds.SHOULD_TICKET_PRICE, ds.TAXES_PRICE, ds.ACTUAL_SALARY_PRICE, ds.ACTUAL_SALARY_ALL_PRICE, ds. CREATOR, ds.CREATE_DATE, ds.CHECKER, ds.CHECK_DATE, ds.NOTARIZE_DATE, ds.CORP_ID,corp.CORP_NAME, creator.USER_NAME as CREATE_NAME,checker.USER_NAME as CHECKER_NAME,ds.REMARK
where del = 0 and SETTLEMENT_MONTH = #{settlementMonth} and SETTLEMENT_DATE <= #{settlementDate} and DRIVER_ID = #{driverId} and ( BILL_STATUS = 1 or BILL_STATUS = 2 )

where ds.del = 0 and ds.SETTLEMENT_ID = #{settlementId} and ds.SETTLEMENT_CODE = #{settlementCode} and ds.DRIVER_ID = #{driverId} and ds.DRIVER_CODE = #{driverCode} and ds.DRIVER_NAME = #{driverName} and ds.TRANSPORTER_ID = #{transporterId and ( ds.TRACTIR_PLATE_CODE = #{tractirPlateCode} or ds.TRACTIR_PLATE_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{tractirPlateCode}),'%') ) and ds.TRACTOR_ID = #{tractorId} and ds.TRACTOR_CODE = #{tractorCode} and ds.TRACTOR_NAME = #{tractorName} and ds.SETTLEMENT_MONTH = #{settlementMonth} and ds.SETTLEMENT_DATE_START = #{settlementDateStart} and ds.SETTLEMENT_DATE_END = #{settlementDateEnd} and ds.ALL_PLAN_COUNT = #{allPlanCount} and ds.RECEIPT_COUNT = #{receiptCount} and ds.SETTLEMENT_DATE = #{settlementDate} and ds.PARTICIPATION_DAY = #{participationDay} and ds.ALL_CONTRACT_PRICE = #{allContractPrice} and ds.ETC = #{etc} and ds.OIL_COST = #{oilCost} and ds.BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus} and ds.SOCIAL_SECURITY_PRICE = #{socialSecurityPrice} and ds.WASH_CAR_PRICE = #{washCarPrice} and ds.REPAIR_PRICE = #{repairPrice} and ds.POUR_TRAILER_PRICE = #{pourTrailerPrice} and ds.LITTLE_TRAILER_PRICE = #{littleTrailerPrice} and ds.BONUS_PRICE = #{bonusPrice} and ds.ORERRUN_PRICE = #{orerrunPrice} and ds.LOSS_PRICE = #{lossPrice} and ds.QUALITYC_CONTROL_PRICE = #{qualitycControlPrice} and ds.OTHER_SUBSIDIES_PRICE = #{otherSubsidiesPrice} and ds.SRECEIVE_PRICE = #{sreceivePrice} and ds.OIL_CARD_PRICE = #{oilCardPrice} and ds.BORROWING_PRICE = #{borrowingPrice} and ds.MANEUVERING_PRICE = #{maneuveringPrice} and ds.ATTENDANCE_PRICE = #{attendancePrice} and ds.MINOR_REPAIR_PRICE = #{minorRepairPrice} and ds.SHOULD_TICKET_PRICE = #{shouldTicketPrice} and ds.TAXES_PRICE = #{taxesPrice} and ds.ACTUAL_SALARY_PRICE = #{actualSalaryPrice} and ds.ACTUAL_SALARY_ALL_PRICE = #{actualSalaryAllPrice} and ds.CREATOR = #{creator} and ds.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and ds.CHECKER = #{checker} and ds.CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate} and ds.NOTARIZE_DATE = #{notarizeDate} and ds.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and ds.REMARK = #{remark} and ds.SETTLEMENT_DATE >= #{starDate} and ds.SETTLEMENT_DATE <= #{endDate} and ( ds.SETTLEMENT_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%') or ds.DRIVER_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%') or ds.DRIVER_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%') )

where del = 0 and SETTLEMENT_ID = #{settlementId} and SETTLEMENT_CODE = #{settlementCode} and DRIVER_ID = #{driverId} and DRIVER_CODE = #{driverCode} and DRIVER_NAME = #{driverName} and TRANSPORTER_ID = #{transporterId} and TRACTIR_PLATE_CODE = #{tractirPlateCode} and TRACTOR_ID = #{tractorId} and TRACTOR_CODE = #{tractorCode} and TRACTOR_NAME = #{tractorName} and SETTLEMENT_MONTH = #{settlementMonth} and SETTLEMENT_DATE_START = #{settlementDateStart} and SETTLEMENT_DATE_END = #{settlementDateEnd} and ALL_PLAN_COUNT = #{allPlanCount} and RECEIPT_COUNT = #{receiptCount} and SETTLEMENT_DATE = #{settlementDate} and PARTICIPATION_DAY = #{participationDay} and ALL_CONTRACT_PRICE = #{allContractPrice} and ETC = #{etc} and OIL_COST = #{oilCost} and BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus} and SOCIAL_SECURITY_PRICE = #{socialSecurityPrice} and WASH_CAR_PRICE = #{washCarPrice} and REPAIR_PRICE = #{repairPrice} and POUR_TRAILER_PRICE = #{pourTrailerPrice} and LITTLE_TRAILER_PRICE = #{littleTrailerPrice} and BONUS_PRICE = #{bonusPrice} and ORERRUN_PRICE = #{orerrunPrice} and LOSS_PRICE = #{lossPrice} and QUALITYC_CONTROL_PRICE = #{qualitycControlPrice} and OTHER_SUBSIDIES_PRICE = #{otherSubsidiesPrice} and SRECEIVE_PRICE = #{sreceivePrice} and OIL_CARD_PRICE = #{oilCardPrice} and BORROWING_PRICE = #{borrowingPrice} and MANEUVERING_PRICE = #{maneuveringPrice} and ATTENDANCE_PRICE = #{attendancePrice} and MINOR_REPAIR_PRICE = #{minorRepairPrice} and SHOULD_TICKET_PRICE = #{shouldTicketPrice} and TAXES_PRICE = #{taxesPrice} and ACTUAL_SALARY_PRICE = #{actualSalaryPrice} and ACTUAL_SALARY_ALL_PRICE = #{actualSalaryAllPrice} and CREATOR = #{creator} and CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and CHECKER = #{checker} and CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate} and NOTARIZE_DATE = #{notarizeDate} and CORP_ID = #{corpId} and REMARK = #{remark} and SETTLEMENT_DATE >= #{starDate} and SETTLEMENT_DATE <= #{endDate}
mapper.select: select from om_driver_settlement where del = 0 and DRIVER_ID in #{item,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select from om_driver_settlement where del = 0 and DRIVER_ID = #{driverId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and SETTLEMENT_MONTH = #{settlementMonth,jdbcType=DATE}

select from om_driver_settlement ds left join bd_user creator ON creator.USER_ID = ds.CREATOR left join bd_user checker ON checker.USER_ID = ds.CHECKER left join sys_corp corp ON ds.CORP_ID = corp.CORP_ID where ds.SETTLEMENT_ID = #{settlementId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into om_driver_settlement (SETTLEMENT_CODE, DRIVER_ID, DRIVER_CODE, DRIVER_NAME, TRANSPORTER_ID, TRACTIR_PLATE_CODE, TRACTOR_ID, TRACTOR_CODE, TRACTOR_NAME, SETTLEMENT_MONTH, SETTLEMENT_DATE_START, SETTLEMENT_DATE_END, ALL_PLAN_COUNT, RECEIPT_COUNT, SETTLEMENT_DATE, PARTICIPATION_DAY, ALL_CONTRACT_PRICE, ETC, OIL_COST, BILL_STATUS, SOCIAL_SECURITY_PRICE, WASH_CAR_PRICE, REPAIR_PRICE, POUR_TRAILER_PRICE, LITTLE_TRAILER_PRICE, BONUS_PRICE, ORERRUN_PRICE, LOSS_PRICE, QUALITYC_CONTROL_PRICE, OTHER_SUBSIDIES_PRICE, SRECEIVE_PRICE, OIL_CARD_PRICE, BORROWING_PRICE, MANEUVERING_PRICE, ATTENDANCE_PRICE, MINOR_REPAIR_PRICE, SHOULD_TICKET_PRICE, TAXES_PRICE, ACTUAL_SALARY_PRICE, ACTUAL_SALARY_ALL_PRICE, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, NOTARIZE_DATE, update om_driver_settlement set SETTLEMENT_CODE = #{settlementCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRIVER_ID = #{driverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DRIVER_CODE = #{driverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRIVER_NAME = #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSPORTER_ID = #{transporterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TRACTIR_PLATE_CODE = #{tractirPlateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRACTOR_ID = #{tractorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TRACTOR_CODE = #{tractorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRACTOR_NAME = #{tractorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTLEMENT_MONTH = #{settlementMonth,jdbcType=DATE}, SETTLEMENT_DATE_START = #{settlementDateStart,jdbcType=DATE}, SETTLEMENT_DATE_END = #{settlementDateEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, ALL_PLAN_COUNT = #{allPlanCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RECEIPT_COUNT = #{receiptCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SETTLEMENT_DATE = #{settlementDate,jdbcType=DATE}, PARTICIPATION_DAY = #{participationDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ALL_CONTRACT_PRICE = #{allContractPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ETC = #{etc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OIL_COST = #{oilCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SOCIAL_SECURITY_PRICE = #{socialSecurityPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WASH_CAR_PRICE = #{washCarPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPAIR_PRICE = #{repairPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, POUR_TRAILER_PRICE = #{pourTrailerPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LITTLE_TRAILER_PRICE = #{littleTrailerPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BONUS_PRICE = #{bonusPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORERRUN_PRICE = #{orerrunPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOSS_PRICE = #{lossPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUALITYC_CONTROL_PRICE = #{qualitycControlPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OTHER_SUBSIDIES_PRICE = #{otherSubsidiesPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SRECEIVE_PRICE = #{sreceivePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OIL_CARD_PRICE = #{oilCardPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BORROWING_PRICE = #{borrowingPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MANEUVERING_PRICE = #{maneuveringPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTENDANCE_PRICE = #{attendancePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MINOR_REPAIR_PRICE = #{minorRepairPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHOULD_TICKET_PRICE = #{shouldTicketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TAXES_PRICE = #{taxesPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTUAL_SALARY_PRICE = #{actualSalaryPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTUAL_SALARY_ALL_PRICE = #{actualSalaryAllPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NOTARIZE_DATE = #{notarizeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SETTLEMENT_ID = #{settlementId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from om_driver_settlement ds left join bd_user creator ON creator.USER_ID = ds.CREATOR left join bd_user checker ON checker.USER_ID = ds.CHECKER left join sys_corp corp ON ds.CORP_ID = corp.CORP_ID order by ds.SETTLEMENT_DATE DESC
select from om_driver_settlement order by SETTLEMENT_DATE DESC
mapper.update: update om_driver_settlement BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, where SETTLEMENT_ID = #{settlementId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select SETTLEMENT_MONTH from om_driver_settlement WHERE DEL = 0 GROUP BY SETTLEMENT_MONTH
select from om_driver_settlement WHERE DEL = 0 and ( SETTLEMENT_MONTH like concat(concat('%',#{settlementMonth}),'%') )
